TopicTitle: SimGamerTV - Let's Play Kerbal Space Program Career Mode

Articles.Content:
Yep, you guessed it. SimGamerTV is doing Career Mode ... from scratch ... again! But this time, we mean it! To the top of the science tree or bust!

Here is Part 2 of Episode 20, where I finally land a fully functional base station on the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qpcDfKrVI44?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

For Posterity - Episode 1:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qa0G0t8tRG8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-09T15:11:42Z" title="07/09/2015 03:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 9, 2015</time> by EtherDragon**

EPISODE 2! Time for some new Plane flying with the release version of aerodynamics!

The Episode:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9-k4d3000So?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The Build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/quxNGkZrp-k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T16:04:53Z" title="05/05/2015 04:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by EtherDragon**

Episode 3 takes us into Orbit to collect a bunch of EVA Reports, as we survey Kerbin - home planet to the Kerbals.

The Episode:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rt8FkGKTEvM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The Build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3H5MK_T6ITA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T16:05:35Z" title="05/05/2015 04:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by EtherDragon**

Another go at some atmospheric flight with the Puddle Jumper in Episode 4:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0MT0krj-Afc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 5, our space agency has attracted the interest of some passengers:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4M-GvWH0I-c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Building Episode 5:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2ZAHww_4BGQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It's Thursday already? Well, better post a couple new videos!

To the Mun!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nsUpGgMyVyA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And the Build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QhbzFOG89b4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 7, we make another attempt at reaching Orbit around the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O1PsrN6MxPg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And, here's the Build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zAmaHzlQD2Q?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In this extended play, we return to the skies with a new Space Plane capable of high altitude operations and surveys:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/H781u6kVnnE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Back to Rocket Missions in Episode 9, time to mount a rescue, as a Kerbal has managed to strand themselves out past the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/F8MPXELp17w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here's the build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1WEPkLP3A_c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Note after Episode 10, I'm taking a 1-week long mid-season break, and this series will be returning (probably with a new thread) on Jun 8th!

In episode 10, It's time to try and land on the Mun!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kCxtom8uHpI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here is the build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OfMD2qp74mw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 11, Jeb is poised to land on the Mun, but first we need to get a quick contract done for a building upgrade - which should allow him to land:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IDKtHW_cGaA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here is the build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C7Y3joIxrB8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In episode 11, we inject our space program with a bunch of Science! collected from Minmas:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AjPzXXqjLek?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

We left some science around the Mun, in Episode 13 it's time to update a craft to be able to retrieve the Science!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vmdVAFKvmqs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here's the Build - which actually has nothing to do with the mission, but it was fun anyway:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c_2cp9TGb0M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In episode 14 we take our first stab at an Apollo-like Mun Landing:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JJsVS2YHTV8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here's the build!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/U2cHa4R5dFs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 15 we make some quick modifications and another attempt at landing on the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/F8eHZ7WVL9U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Time to try and land on the Mun ... again. Maybe this time we can land AND return AND rescue some stranded Science!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7UhD1ri8FYs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In episode 17, our space agency places it's first permanent manned space station in Low Kerbin Orbit:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GeL6jxzvsh0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here's the build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GvMY9Bgw3Jo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In episode 18, it's time to mount a rescue to get a stranded crew person from the Mun and retrieve their Science!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tEOYHsxekOU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And, there's a build, too:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BizVp_QaA78?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 19, we retrieve some unknown debris from Low Kerbin Orbit:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SRZ4jKFfvLU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And here's the build:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LfPgvyjR8_g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It's the finale of the season and this is the first part. We head to the Mun to establish our first permanent base:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/trca4aCJ6PY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here is Part 2 of Episode 20, where I finally land a fully functional base station on the Mun:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qpcDfKrVI44?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
